DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine rise plasma Beta-hydroxy-beta-methylbutyrate ( HMB ) dietary supplement administer different form . Prior study indicate form administration affect bioavailability HMB supplement . Therefore current study examine bioavailability single dose HMB give : - 1.0g CaHMB gelatin capsule - 0.8 g HMB free acid gelcap - 0.8 g HMB free acid water - 1.0 g CaHMB water - 0.8 g HMB free acid The randomize study crossover design study subject undergo experimental protocol supplementation form . Because different administration form , study open label study . Briefly , fast participant report laboratory morning . After initial blood sample take , dose HMB administer . Blood sample 2 , 5 , 10 , 15 , 25 , 35 , 45 , 60 , 90 , 120 , 180 , 360 , 720 , 1440 min post administration . A 24 h complete urine collection also perform . Participants give light sack lunch 4 h administration dosage remain laboratory 360 min sampling . Participants allow leave laboratory return 720 min sample participant eat normal evening meal . Participants return laboratory fast next morning final sample . A minimum 48 h washout period require next dosage form administer process repeat .
DOC.brief_title: Alternate Dosing Strategies Beta-hydroxy-beta-methylbutyrate ( HMB ) Supplementation : Effect Plasma HMB Responses
